<title level="1" right="Rules">[Golarion](/Rules.aspx?ID=3298)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Pathfinder is set on the planet Golarion during the Age of Lost Omens. It is an ancient world with a rich diversity of people and cultures, exciting locations to explore, and deadly villains. More information on the Age of Lost Omens, the world of Golarion, and its deities can be found on [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=2066).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
